text: The Wishing Tree (, , ) is a 1974 Georgian drama movie directed by Tengiz Abuladze and was based on the short stories by Giorgi Leonidze. It stars Lika Kavzharadze, Kakhi Kavsadze, Zaza Kolelishvili, Sofiko Chiaureli, Erosi Manjgaladze. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 drama movies Category:Georgian movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Tengiz Abuladze
title: The Wishing Tree (movie)
